channel.title: Found this in muclient 39
channel.description:
I found this while refactoring, and extracting the item definitions and thought it was awesome, i need to go in-game and get pictures of the sprites :P
[code=xml] <itemDef> <itemName>Illusion-Rune</itemName> <itemType>Rune</itemType> <itemExamine>One of the advanced runes of magic</itemExamine> <itemID>38</itemID> <itemPrice>1</itemPrice> <itemStackable>0</itemStackable> <itemCommand></itemCommand> </itemDef>
<itemDef> <itemName>Nature-Rune</itemName> <itemType>Rune</itemType> <itemExamine>One of the advanced runes of magic</itemExamine> <itemID>39</itemID> <itemPrice>1</itemPrice> <itemStackable>0</itemStackable> <itemCommand></itemCommand> </itemDef>
<itemDef> <itemName>Chaos-Rune</itemName> <itemType>Rune</itemType> <itemExamine>One of the advanced runes of magic</itemExamine> <itemID>40</itemID> <itemPrice>1</itemPrice> <itemStackable>0</itemStackable> <itemCommand></itemCommand> </itemDef>
<itemDef> <itemName>Law-Rune</itemName> <itemType>Rune</itemType> <itemExamine>One of the advanced runes of magic</itemExamine> <itemID>41</itemID> <itemPrice>1</itemPrice> <itemStackable>0</itemStackable> <itemCommand></itemCommand> </itemDef>
<itemDef> <itemName>Time-Rune</itemName> <itemType>Rune</itemType> <itemExamine>An incredibly rare master rune!</itemExamine> <itemID>42</itemID> <itemPrice>1</itemPrice> <itemStackable>0</itemStackable> <itemCommand></itemCommand> </itemDef>
<itemDef> <itemName>Soul-Rune</itemName> <itemType>Rune</itemType> <itemExamine>An incredibly rare master rune!</itemExamine> <itemID>43</itemID> <itemPrice>1</itemPrice> <itemStackable>0</itemStackable> <itemCommand></itemCommand> </itemDef>
<itemDef> <itemName>Reality-Rune</itemName> <itemType>Rune</itemType> <itemExamine>An incredibly rare master rune!</itemExamine> <itemID>44</itemID> <itemPrice>1</itemPrice> <itemStackable>0</itemStackable> <itemCommand></itemCommand> </itemDef>[/code]

item.title: Found this in muclient 39
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

[quote=“Pompano21, post:9, topic:402629”][quote author=IlikeArrays link=topic=499687.msg3656802#msg3656802 date=1310080748]
Id post the sprites but I am not on my fuck around pc

Good memories
[/quote]

Pretty good memory considering you were like 8[/quote]

I know

Read full topic

item.title: Found this in muclient 39
item.dc:creator: @mokoma mokoma
item.description:
@mokoma wrote:

timm2322:

Lol i remeber stuff from RSC when i was 8 (or 10), like getting my first rune med, they were 10k, but i was so happy

When I was 9 or so I accidentally skulled at castle in the wild, had the doors closed on me, and died, protecting my plate over my r2h. I remember crying earnest tears of sorrow and pain for a good five minutes.

Then I made my first pb and never looked back.

Read full topic

item.title: Found this in muclient 39
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

[quote=“mokoma, post:6, topic:402629”][quote author=imthenull link=topic=499687.msg3654478#msg3654478 date=1309922340]
I found this while refactoring, and extracting the item definitions and thought it was awesome, i need to go in-game and get pictures of the sprites

[code=xml]

Illusion-Rune
Rune
One of the advanced runes of magic
38
1
0

Nature-Rune Rune One of the advanced runes of magic 39 1 0 Chaos-Rune Rune One of the advanced runes of magic 40 1 0 Law-Rune Rune One of the advanced runes of magic 41 1 0 Time-Rune Rune An incredibly rare master rune! 42 1 0 Soul-Rune Rune An incredibly rare master rune! 43 1 0 Reality-Rune Rune An incredibly rare master rune! 44 1 0 [/code] [/quote]

You forgot the life rune, and the fact that a lot of the rune weapons have odd names still. Also, SUPERCHISEL.[/quote]
I didnt forget it, this is just a small piece of the info ive extracted from the cache and yes, SUPERCHISEL lol, dont forget MAGIC CABBAGE too!

Read full topic
